R

randSmooth - Variable in class GameFiles.Fox
for smoothing out the speed
randy - Variable in class GameFiles.GameObject
random object used randomly throughout program
removeObject() - Method in class GameFiles.GameObject
 
resetPoly() - Method in class GameFiles.GameObject
Resets Polygon with its origin at x, y and its size to be its width and height
restart - Variable in class GameFiles.LoseScreen
button you press to restart game
restartSetup() - Method in class GameFiles.LoseScreen
connects the restart button to the right arrow key
right - Variable in class GameFiles.Quiz
all of the Jbuttons involved in the quiz
right - Static variable in class GameFiles.SideScrollModel
to see if the final quiz question was answered correctly
RIGHT_KEY_CODE - Static variable in class GameFiles.Constants
 
rightAnswers - Variable in class GameFiles.Quiz
arraylists of each type of answer
